text: Tumi bale ya'o -- ''tomara ki bhebe dekhecha -- eti yadi allahâ€Œra kacha theke haye thake ara tomara ete abisbasa kara, athaca isara'ilera bansadharadera theke ekajana saksyadata tamra anurupa sanbandhe saksya dena, phale tini bisbasa karena, kintu tomara garbabodha kara? Nihsandeha allah an'yayacari jatike satpathe calana na.
